DOC.brief_summary: This study estimate fast two antiepileptic drug ( Levetiracetam Brivaracetam ) enter human brain . Brain imaging use measure quickly radioactive probe [ 11C ] UCB-J exit brain Levetiracetam Brivaracetam give intravenously . This used estimate fast antiepileptic drug enter brain .
DOC.brief_title: A Brain Imaging Study With Positron Emission Tomography Radiotracer 11CUCB-J Estimate How Fast Brivaracetam Levetiracetam Enter Brain Healthy Volunteers

Subjects receive diagnostic therapeutic radiopharmaceutical le 7 day prior participation study Participation recent research study < 1 month < 1 year study involve ionizing radiation would cause subject exceed yearly dose limit healthy volunteer
